services_summary: Industry: Fencing. Service: Privacy fence design + install. Client wants a new backyard fence for privacy and to match their home style.

plan.question: Which sides of the property need fencing?
About how many linear feet need fencing?
What’s the main goal (privacy, pets, security, pool code)?
Preferred material (wood, vinyl, composite, metal)?
Desired height and top style (flat, lattice, scalloped)?
How many gates and what widths do you need?
Any slope/uneven ground or hard soil/roots?
Any stain/paint color or finish preference?

services_summary: Industry: Fencing. Service: Front yard decorative fence. Client wants a low, modern fence for curb appeal with a matching gate.

plan.question: Where is the fence going (front yard, side yard, driveway)?
What style should it match (modern, traditional, farmhouse)?
Material preference (steel/aluminum, wood, mixed)?
Target height (e.g., 3ft, 4ft)?
Gate type (walk gate, driveway gate, both)?
Do you want tight slats/pickets or more open spacing?
Preferred color/finish (black, bronze, natural wood)?
Any HOA rules or permit requirements to follow?

services_summary: Industry: Landscape Design. Service: Backyard design. Client wants an outdoor hangout: patio, planting, and low-maintenance layout.

plan.question: How do you want to use the backyard (dining, lounge, play, pets)?
Do you know the approximate dimensions of the space?
How much sun does it get (full sun, part shade, mostly shade)?
Any drainage issues or areas that stay muddy?
Patio material preference (pavers, concrete, flagstone, gravel)?
Planting style preference (modern, lush, native, Mediterranean)?
How low-maintenance do you want it to be?
Can you share inspiration photos you like?

services_summary: Industry: Landscape Design. Service: Front yard xeriscape. Client wants drought-tolerant curb appeal with a clean, modern look.

plan.question: What’s there now (lawn, rock, plants, bare dirt)?
Any watering restrictions or low-water requirement?
Style preference (modern, desert, cottage, native)?
Do you want a new walkway or entry feature?
Do you prefer more greenery or more rock/stone with accents?
Do you want crisp edging/borders or a more natural look?
Do you want landscape lighting included?
Can you share photos of the front yard from the street?

services_summary: Industry: Bathroom Remodeling. Service: Primary bath design. Client wants a spa-like bathroom with updated tile, vanity, and lighting.

plan.question: What are the bathroom dimensions (approx.)?
Are you keeping the layout or moving plumbing?
Do you want a shower, tub, or both?
Single or double vanity, and what width?
Style direction (modern, transitional, classic, Japandi)?
Tile preferences (large-format, subway, natural stone, terrazzo)?
Fixture finish preference (chrome, black, brass, nickel)?
Mirror + lighting preference (sconces, backlit mirror, overhead)?

services_summary: Industry: Bathroom Remodeling. Service: Guest bath refresh. Client wants a budget-conscious update that still looks high-end.

plan.question: What are you changing (vanity, toilet, shower/tub, tile, paint)?
What must stay as-is?
What vibe do you want (bright, moody, clean, playful)?
Any preferred colors or colors to avoid?
Material preferences for vanity/top (quartz, wood, laminate)?
Do you need more storage than you have now?
Any known issues (leaks, mold, cracked tile)?
Can you share photos + rough measurements?

services_summary: Industry: Kitchen Design. Service: Kitchen redesign. Client wants a more functional layout and modern finishes.

plan.question: What are the kitchen dimensions (approx.)?
Are you keeping plumbing/appliances in place?
What storage or workflow problems are you solving?
Cabinet style preference (flat-panel, shaker, slab)?
Countertop preference (quartz, stone, butcher block)?
Backsplash style/material preference?
Any appliance sizes/brands already chosen?
Do you want under-cabinet + pendant + recessed lighting?

services_summary: Industry: House Painting. Service: Exterior paint design. Client wants a new exterior color scheme with updated trim/door colors.

plan.question: What style is the home (modern, craftsman, ranch, etc.)?
What are the current body/trim colors?
Do you want lighter, darker, warmer, or cooler colors?
Any elements to highlight (front door, shutters, garage)?
What exterior surfaces (stucco, siding, brick, trim)?
Any HOA or neighborhood color rules?
Finish preference (flat, satin, semi-gloss for trim)?
Can you share photos of all sides of the house?

services_summary: Industry: House Painting. Service: Interior paint design. Client wants cohesive wall colors for an open-plan living/dining/kitchen.

plan.question: Which rooms are included in the paint plan?
Any fixed elements to match (floors, cabinets, countertops)?
How much natural light does the space get?
What mood do you want (bright, cozy, calm, bold)?
Do you want trim/doors the same color or contrasting?
Any accent walls or special finishes?
Any preferred paint brand/line?
Can you share photos and (if possible) a rough floor plan?

services_summary: Industry: Interior Design. Service: Living room full design. Client wants furniture layout, materials, and a complete shopping list.

plan.question: What are the room dimensions and ceiling height?
What items must stay (sofa, rug, art, TV)?
Any constraints (walkways, doors, fireplace, outlets)?
Style direction (modern, transitional, eclectic, minimal)?
Preferred color palette (neutrals, warm, cool, bold)?
Material preferences (wood tones, metals, textures, fabrics)?
Do you want more cozy/soft or sleek/structured?
Budget range for furniture + decor?

services_summary: Industry: Interior Design. Service: Bedroom design. Client wants a calm, hotel-like bedroom with better storage and lighting.

plan.question: What are the bedroom dimensions (approx.)?
What bed size (queen, king)?
What storage problems are you trying to solve?
Style direction (modern, cozy, classic, minimalist)?
Preferred colors and colors to avoid?
Do you need blackout window treatments?
Lighting preference (lamps, sconces, overhead, dimmers)?
Any inspiration images you love?

services_summary: Industry: Interior Design. Service: Home office design. Client needs an ergonomic setup and a background that looks great on Zoom.

plan.question: Is this a dedicated room or a nook/alcove?
What’s the approximate size of the space?
What equipment do you use (monitors, printer, standing desk)?
Storage needs (files, books, supplies)?
What should be behind you on video calls (shelves, art, plain wall)?
Style direction (clean modern, warm wood, bold, minimal)?
Any preferred colors?
Lighting needs (task light, ring light, overhead, window glare)?

services_summary: Industry: Outdoor Living. Service: Patio design. Client wants a paver patio with dining area and fire feature.

plan.question: What size patio are you imagining (approx.)?
What needs to fit (dining table size, lounge seating)?
Paver style preference (large modern, cobble, mixed sizes)?
Preferred color tone (warm, cool, neutral)?
Fire feature type (fire pit, gas fireplace, none)?
Any slope/drainage constraints to plan for?
Do you want paths/steps connecting the patio to the house?
Can you share photos of the area + existing patio/yard?

services_summary: Industry: Outdoor Living. Service: Deck design. Client wants a small deck with stairs and railing that matches their home.

plan.question: Where will the deck connect to the house?
Desired deck size (approx. width x depth)?
Material preference (wood, composite)?
Railing style preference (cable, metal, wood, glass)?
How many stairs/landings are needed?
Do you want under-deck storage or waterproofing?
Do you want stair/rail lighting?
Do you need help with permits/HOA approvals?

services_summary: Industry: Pergola & Shade. Service: Pergola design + install. Client wants shade over an existing patio with a modern look.

plan.question: What size area do you want covered?
Attached to the house or freestanding?
Material preference (wood, aluminum, steel)?
Roof type (open slats, louvered, solid cover)?
Preferred color/finish to match the house?
Add-ons needed (lighting, fan, heaters, shades)?
How windy/sunny is the area?
Can you share photos of the patio + attachment point?

services_summary: Industry: Custom Built-ins. Service: Media wall built-in. Client wants a built-in around the TV with hidden storage and modern detailing.

plan.question: What are the wall dimensions (width x height)?
What size TV (inches) and is it mounted?
Storage mix (open shelves, closed cabinets, drawers)?
Style direction (modern, minimal, traditional, fluted, etc.)?
Finish preference (paint color, wood tone, mixed)?
Do you want integrated lighting (LED shelves)?
Any device/cable management needs?
Any constraints (outlets, vents, baseboards, fireplace)?

services_summary: Industry: Closet Design. Service: Reach-in closet design. Client wants a clean, efficient closet system for a shared closet.

plan.question: What are the closet dimensions (width x depth x height)?
How many people will use this closet?
What’s the wardrobe mix (long hang, short hang, folded, shoes)?
Do you want drawers built into the system?
Finish preference (white, wood tone, dark, mixed)?
Any accessories (belt rack, valet rod, hamper)?
Are you keeping existing doors or changing them?
Can you share photos and rough measurements?

services_summary: Industry: Flooring. Service: Flooring selection + install. Client wants a cohesive floor throughout main level that fits the home’s style.

plan.question: Which rooms are included in the flooring project?
What’s the current flooring and what’s staying?
Style direction (light oak, warm walnut, modern gray, etc.)?
Material preference (LVP, engineered wood, tile)?
Durability needs (pets, kids, heavy traffic)?
Any stairs or transitions to match?
Any soundproofing or underlayment requirements?
When do you want install to happen?

services_summary: Industry: Window Treatments. Service: Window treatment design. Client wants a cohesive look with privacy and light control for bedrooms and living room.

plan.question: Which rooms need window treatments?
Priority: privacy, blackout, or light filtering?
Style direction (minimal, classic drapery, modern shades)?
Preferred color/texture to match the room?
Do you prefer inside-mount or outside-mount?
Do you want motorized controls?
Do you have window measurements or need measuring help?
Can you share photos of the windows + surrounding trim?

services_summary: Industry: Interior Design. Service: Nursery design. Client wants a calm nursery that can grow with the child, with functional storage.

plan.question: What are the nursery dimensions (approx.)?
Any items you’re keeping (crib, glider, dresser)?
Style direction (minimal, modern, classic, playful)?
Preferred colors and colors to avoid?
Do you want a theme or keep it more timeless?
What storage do you need (toys, books, clothes)?
Lighting needs (blackout, dimmer, night light)?
Any inspiration images you love?
